left.text: omg, on our trip, there was this one completely clueless bitch type girl in our district. she was clueless, i hate girls like that -_-
they're generally mean to people like me, because i'm rather shy in real life, and i've got a goofy sense of humor that puts most girls off

right.text: I love girls like that, all they care about is dating and boys and looking as hot as they possibly can, which I've got to say, quite appeals to me.

left.text: so they talk to me for 10 minutes, raise their eyebrow, and walk away mumbling "ookay"
